message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.DS, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of selecting initial seed users in a social network to propagate a topic. This falls under the category of social influence maximization (cs.SI) and social network analysis (cs.SOC). The paper also formulates the problem as an optimization problem and provides an approximation algorithm, which involves techniques from algorithms and data structures (cs.DS), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), and machine learning (cs.LG).
